element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm converts a RGB(Red, Green. Blue) image in a HSI (Hue, Saturation, Intensity) one. The three bands needed for input (R,G,B) do not have to belong to the same image (layer)

element.name: LAYERR
element.text: The layer that contains the band with Red values

element.name: LAYERG
element.text: The layer that contains the band with Green values

element.name: LAYERB
element.text: The layer that contains the band with Blue values

element.name: OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION
element.text: The algorithm generates 3 new single-band layers, one for each component of the HSI image.
